EmailTemplate.subject: RE: MBO Partners / James Lewis (1339793089.0)
EmailTemplate.textOnly: - - - Clean Clean false false false EN-US X-NONE X-NONE Hi Jim, No worries at all. Thanks for the update! Take care,Sara From: Jim Lewis [mailto:jimlewis142@yahoo.com] Sent: Friday, June 15, 2012 11:13 AM To: Sara Conde Subject: Re: MBO Partners / James Lewis Sara, I apologize for the delayed response.... your email (below) was sent to the junk folder.... That won't happen again! I'm still in a "holding pattern" to use an aviation analogy. More questions than answers wrt budget up here. Am still hopefull something will come out of this, and will keep you posted! Jim From: Sara Conde <sconde@mbopartners.com <mailto:sconde@mbopartners.com>> To: jimlewis142@yahoo.com <mailto:jimlewis142@yahoo.com> Sent: Thursday, June 7, 2012 3:05 PM Subject: MBO Partners / James LewisHello James,I wanted to follow up with you from our conversation regarding the services provided by MBO Partners. You mentioned you may be starting a new consulting contract. How is that going?Here are a few tools that summarize our conversation from before: - There are some webinars and videos we have created that might assist you in finding your next contract if you have not already found one: http://mkto-l0128.com/track?type=click&enid=bWFpbGluZ2lkPXByb2QtbC0xOTMmbWVzc2FnZWlkPTE5MyZkYXRhYmFzZWlkPTEzMzQ4ODgwOTkmc2VyaWFsPTEyNjQ4MjcyNTAmZW1haWxpZD1qaW1sZXdpczE0MkB5YWhvby5jb20mdXNlcmlkPWwtMTI4LTExNzk3LTk0NzYxJmV4dHJhPSYmJg==&&&http://www.mbopartners.com/mbo-partners-webcast-index?mkt_tok=3RkMMJWWfF9wsRonvKjNZKXonjHpfsXx7%2BsrWLHr08Yy0EZ5VunJEUWy2YEDRdQhcOuuEwcWGog8zQ5X <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?type=click&enid=bWFpbGluZ2lkPXByb2QtbC0xOTMmbWVzc2FnZWlkPTE5MyZkYXRhYmFzZWlkPTEzMzQ4ODgwOTkmc2VyaWFsPTEyNjQ4MjcyNTAmZW1haWxpZD1qaW1sZXdpczE0MkB5YWhvby5jb20mdXNlcmlkPWwtMTI4LTExNzk3LTk0NzYxJmV4dHJhPSYmJg==&&&http://www.mbopartners.com/mbo-partners-webcast-index?mkt_tok=3RkMMJWWfF9wsRonvKjNZKXonjHpfsXx7%2BsrWLHr08Yy0EZ5VunJEUWy2YEDRdQhcOuuEwcWGog8zQ5X> - MBO Partners continues to invest in being a leader for independent consultants across the country. I also wanted to share the news that we released a study you may be interested in. For the first time, theres real hard facts about The State of Independence in America <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?type=click&enid=bWFpbGluZ2lkPXByb2QtbC0xOTMmbWVzc2FnZWlkPTE5MyZkYXRhYmFzZWlkPTEzMzQ4ODgwOTkmc2VyaWFsPTEyNjQ4MjcyNTAmZW1haWxpZD1qaW1sZXdpczE0MkB5YWhvby5jb20mdXNlcmlkPWwtMTI4LTExNzk3LTk0NzYxJmV4dHJhPSYmJg==&&&http://info.mbopartners.com/stateofindependence?mkt_tok=3RkMMJWWfF9wsRonvKjNZKXonjHpfsXx7%2BsrWLHr08Yy0EZ5VunJEUWy2YEDRdQhcOuuEwcWGog8zQ5X> that will reveal not just how many millions of independent professionals there are in the country, but also the unique things that motivate them and help them stay happily independent. Any update would be great, look forward to hearing from you.Regards,Sara___________________________________Sara CondeConsultant Services AdvisorMBO Partners t: 703-793-6028f: 703.793.6081e: sconde@mbopartners.com <mailto:sconde@mbopartners.com>w: www.mbopartners.com <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?type=click&enid=bWFpbGluZ2lkPXByb2QtbC0xOTMmbWVzc2FnZWlkPTE5MyZkYXRhYmFzZWlkPTEzMzQ4ODgwOTkmc2VyaWFsPTEyNjQ4MjcyNTAmZW1haWxpZD1qaW1sZXdpczE0MkB5YWhvby5jb20mdXNlcmlkPWwtMTI4LTExNzk3LTk0NzYxJmV4dHJhPSYmJg==&&&http://www.mbopartners.com/?mkt_tok=3RkMMJWWfF9wsRonvKjNZKXonjHpfsXx7%2BsrWLHr08Yy0EZ5VunJEUWy2YEDRdQhcOuuEwcWGog8zQ5X> </html
